fields.name: contactType
fields.title: Contact Type
fields.description: A person or organization can have different contact points, for different purposes. For example, a sales contact point, a PR contact point and so on. This property is used to specify the kind of contact point.

fields.name: email
fields.title: Email Address
fields.description: An email address associated with this item.

fields.name: telephone
fields.title: Telephone
fields.description: A telephone number associated with this item.

fields.name: faxNumber
fields.title: Fax Nunber
fields.description: A fax number associated with this item.
